assignments.name: Assign_Project_Name_Not_Looked_Up
assignments.label: Assign Project Name Not Looked Up

choices.name: ClearDebris
choices.choiceText: Has the site of the temporary use been cleared of all debris? Note: All debris must be cleared within five (5) of the end of the temporary use

choices.name: CrowdControl
choices.choiceText: Have adequate provisions for crowd control been provided? Note: Applicant may be required to provide plans for crowd control.

choices.name: LightingOrElectrical
choices.choiceText: Is site lighting or electrical service needed to support the temporary use? Note: No lighting or electrical service shall be provided without an electrical permit.

choices.name: No_Sign_Permit
choices.choiceText: --Have not applied yet--

choices.name: Parking
choices.choiceText: Has adequate parking been provided? Note: Required parking for other uses must remain available

choices.name: Permission
choices.choiceText: Has written permission from the property owner has been obtained? (Complete the Owner’s Consent Form)

choices.name: Project_Not_Shown
choices.choiceText: --PROJECT NOT SHOWN--

choices.name: RemainUnblocked
choices.choiceText: Is the temporary use located so that all fire lanes, pedestrian access and vehicular access points remain unblocked?

choices.name: TempStructure
choices.choiceText: Is the temporary use located in a temporary structure? Note: No structure shall be erected without a building permit.

choices.name: TrafficControl
choices.choiceText: Have adequate traffic controls measures been provided? Note: Applicant may be required to provide a maintenance of traffic plan.

choices.name: TrashSanitary
choices.choiceText: Have adequate provisions for trash disposal and sanitary facilities been provided? Note: Applicant may be required to provide additional information on the site plan.

decisions.name: Is_the_Sign_Permit_Looked_Up
decisions.label: Is the Sign Permit Looked Up?

formulas.description: Using this to hide custom fields for later phase 2 implementation
formulas.name: Hidden

fields.name: Zoning_Compliance_Header
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: Are_you_submitting_the_application_under_the_ordinances_and_policies_in_effect_a
fields.fieldText: Are you submitting the application under the ordinances and policies in effect at the time the application is accepted for review by the Town of Clayton?

fields.name: Please_specify_the_ordinance_s_and_or_policy_ies_including_version_s_under_which
fields.fieldText: Please specify the ordinance(s) and/or policy(ies), including version(s), under which the application is being submitted?

fields.name: Is_this_for_an_existing_Project
fields.fieldText: Is this for an existing Project?

fields.name: What_is_the_current_project_name
fields.fieldText: What is the current project name?

fields.name: Enter_either_the_approved_Site_Plan_number_or_the_Building_Permit_number_for_the
fields.fieldText: Enter either the approved Site Plan number or the Building Permit number for the principal structure that is to be placed on the subject site

fields.name: Sign_Instructions
fields.fieldText: A sign permit (temporary) is required

fields.name: Is_the_tent_800_square_feet_or_more
fields.fieldText: Is the tent 800 square feet or more?

fields.name: Tent_Instructions
fields.fieldText: You will be required to upload your Tent Permit as a submission with this application.

fields.name: Is_the_tent_enclosed_with_wall_panels
fields.fieldText: Is the tent enclosed with wall panels?

fields.name: Construction_Permit_Req
fields.fieldText: A Construction Permit is required to erect the tent.

fields.name: Operation_Permit_Req
fields.fieldText: An Operational Permit is required occupy the tent.

fields.name: Does_this_project_require_any_of_the_following_utility_connections
fields.fieldText: Does this project require any of the following utility connections?

fields.name: Will_hazardous_materials_be_stored_in_the_container
fields.fieldText: Will hazardous materials be stored in the container?
